mistakes.lesson: NEVER commit secrets files. Use Shuttle CLI exclusively.
mistakes.prevention: Add pre-commit hook to block Secrets.toml commits

mistakes.mistake: Input validation defined but not enforced
mistakes.lesson: Validator decorators must be paired with .validate() calls in handlers
mistakes.prevention: Add integration tests that verify validation is enforced

mistakes.lesson: Extract common patterns early before duplication spreads
mistakes.prevention: Use generics and traits for reusable patterns

mistakes.lesson: Writing tests later is much harder than writing them alongside code
mistakes.prevention: TDD or at minimum write tests before refactoring

mistakes.lesson: Choose one error handling strategy and use it consistently
mistakes.prevention: Define custom error types early in the project

technicalDebtIncurred: No repository pattern (business logic in handlers)
